entity.name: Thierry Laurion
entity.description: Thierry Laurion, founder of Insurgo Open Technologies and maintainer of the Heads open-source firmware project. Dedicated to developing secure, user-friendly technologies that enhance physical security and data protection.

projects.name: Heads
projects.description: Heads is an open-source firmware project designed to enhance the security and integrity of laptops and servers. It provides a tamper-evident and cryptographically verified boot process, empowering users to maintain control over their hardware and data.
